poem:
Title: "Dawn Over the Arctic Gulag"

In the breathless white of Arctic silence,
Ukraine's thousand lights have blinked away.
While deep into Siberian confinement,
Navalny threads irony through frigid day.

Imagining warmth in Polar isolation,
Drones hum above, casting eerie shadows.
A dance with tyranny's cold calculations -
In the vast tundra, a sparrow's sorrow.
